allow: Bash(/Applications/Docker.app/Contents/Resources/bin/docker exec -it datewithai-postgres psql -U postgres -d datewithai -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = ''public'' AND (table_name LIKE ''%embedding%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%vector%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%knowledge%'');")

Bash(/Applications/Docker.app/Contents/Resources/bin/docker exec datewithai-postgres psql -U postgres -d datewithai -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = ''public'' AND (table_name LIKE ''%embedding%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%vector%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%knowledge%'');")
Bash(/Applications/Docker.app/Contents/Resources/bin/docker exec datewithai-postgres psql -U postgres -d datewithai -c "\d embeddings")

Bash(/Applications/Docker.app/Contents/Resources/bin/docker exec datewithai-postgres psql -U postgres -d datewithai -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_records, array_length(embedding, 1) as vector_dimension FROM embeddings GROUP BY array_length(embedding, 1);")
Bash(/Applications/Docker.app/Contents/Resources/bin/docker exec datewithai-postgres psql -U postgres -d datewithai -c "DELETE FROM embeddings;")
